release.description: JDFLib-J 2.1.3, validation, device capabilities checking, and bug fixes
release.action: More information about changes, see the README file.

release.description: MIME support, asynchronous messaging, and more
release.action: More information about changes, see the README file.
Migrated to the latest version of CIP4's JDFLib-J from CVS. This means that all dependencies on package com.heidelberg.JDFLib have been replaced with package org.cip4.jdflib.
Added support for asynchronous processing. For example, Elk now sends outgoing messages asynchronously. Elk's current implementation of asynchronous processing leverages Mule.
Added a quick start guide to the documentation.
Tweaked the Ant build script.
Added an Ant build script and all third-party libraries used so that developers can easily use Ant instead of Maven for building Elk.
Added new remote repositories to Maven's project.properties.
Updated Maven project files.

release.description: Fixed bug in MIME test tool
release.action: Fixed a bug in org.cip4.elk.impl.testtools.servlet.ElkMimeTestJMFServlet that caused the last phase of the MIME package extraction to fail. The JMF Response from ElkMimeTestJMFServlet still does not include the JMF Commands refID, which is a bug that will be fixed.
Added a basic implementation of a subscription manager: org.cip4.elk.impl.jmf.SimpleSubscriptionMananger . See the JavaDocs for a list of its features and limitations.

Renamed org.cip4.elk.impl.jmf.servlet.ConfigurableMimeJMFServlet to org.cip4.elk.impl.testtools.servlet.ElkMimeTestJMFServlet since it not really part of the reference device implementation, just a servlet for testing JMF clients that send MIME packages. In the future this servlet will be refactored so that it has no dependencies on org.cip4.elk.impl and it will be moved to org.cip4.elk.testtools.servlet.

Added support for receiving MIME packages. An implementation that can be used for testing JMF clients that send MIME can be found at http://cog.itn.liu.se:8080/elk/mime. The contents of MIME packages posted to the URL above will be extracted. URLs to the extracted files can be found in the JMF Response. For more information, see the Javadoc of org.cip4.elk.impl.jmf.servlet.ConfigurableMimeJMFServlet.
Added class for parsing MIME packages and extracting their contents. See org.cip4.elk.jmf.mime.MimeReader in Javadoc.
All JMF servlets now extend an abstract base servlet that does logging and delegates to methods depending on request content-type. See org.cip4.elk.jmf.servlet.JMFServlet.
New queue implementation: org.cip4.elk.impl.queue.StateQueueImpl
Added JMFProcessor for HoldQueue command.
Added JMFProcessor for ResumeQueue command.
All servlets now return the correct Content-Type.
Another release with basic functionality. The following JMF messages are supported: KnownMessages, SubmitQueueEntry and QueueStatus.
This is the first release.
